title: Street Exeter Dinner Offer
description: Dinner offer at Street Exeter. Get $2.50 back when you spend $25 or more on dinner entrees.

content.restaurant_description: Street Exeter is an international fusion restaurant serving Rare Burger ($16.00), Medium Rare Burger ($16.00), Medium Burger ($16.00), Medium Well Burger ($16.00), Well Burger ($16.00), Porchetta ($16.00), Grilled Chick Torta ($17.00), Grilled Chicken Cemita ($17.00), Fake Chicken Cemita ($17.00), Veggie Burger Cemita ($17.00), Black Bean Cemita ($17.00), Grilled Pork Cemita ($17.00), BBQ Beef Cemita ($17.00), Medium Rare Burger Cemita ($17.00), Medium Burger Cemita ($17.00), Medium Well Burger Cemita ($17.00), Seafood Patty Cemita ($18.00), Mexicali Bowl ($16.00), Noodle Bowl ($16.00), Avocado Bibimbap ($23.00), Fake Chicken Bibimbap ($23.00), Seared White Fish Bibimbap ($25.00), Pork Bap ($23.00), Singapore Salad ($15.00), What About Cobb ($17.00), Miso Salad ($14.00) and more. Open 11:30 am - 8:30 pm. Located in 8 Clifford Street, Exeter, NH 03833.

restrictions: Valid for dine-in and takeout orders
Cannot be combined with other offers

attribution.instructions: Upload your receipt after dining to receive your bounty
